item.title: Has Gopal Snacks Ltd declared dividend?
item.description: Yes, Gopal Snacks Ltd has declared a dividend of 35% (0.25 per share) with an ex-date of February 2, 2026. Despite the dividend, total returns over various periods have been negative or neutral, indicating challenges in price performance. Time: Jan 28 2026 11:30 PM IST
